Thai Header Spacing Fix Test

Test different Unicode control character strategies to fix Thai text truncation in PDFs

Testing Instructions

  1. Select your preferred font (Sarabun or NotoSansThai)
  2. Click "Test PDF" for each variant to download a test PDF
  3. Open each PDF in multiple viewers:
    • macOS Preview
    • Adobe Acrobat Reader
    • Chrome PDF Viewer
  4. Check if the header displays correctly: "‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏©‡∏±‡∏ó ‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏ü ‡∏Æ‡∏±‡∏ö ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏î (‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏ç‡πà)"
  5. Check if postal codes display fully: "40000" (not "400")
  6. Mark each variant as "Works" or "Broken"
  7. Record which solution works best across all viewers
